info.title: Microsoft Support Plugin
info.description: Returns the first response from Microsoft Support to the user when they have a question regarding one of Microsoft products

get.summary: Get the Microsoft Support response for a question give in query parameters

parameters.name: originalInput
parameters.description: Represents the question to ask Microsoft support in natural language as asked by the user

schema.example: How can i use Microsoft Teams

parameters.name: originalLanguageFromIsoCode
parameters.description: Represents the language used by the user for the question, the response must be in same language

microsoftSupport.description: The first response from Microsoft Support

linkEncoded.description: Encode link placed on the title of the response from Microsoft Support

link.description: Decoded link placed on Microsoft Support response title

appliesTo.description: Microsoft application related to the response (may be null)

isoCodeLanguage.description: Represente the language must be use for GPT response
